events.text: Ahoi Commander! Welcome to the Lantia System!
I am your communications officer lieutenant Jinx. I am here to keep your up to date.
Your first mission will be a simple patrole through a nearby asteroid field.
We don't expect any trouble. Just avoid getting hit by asteroids and you should be good.
You can shoot down a few of the rocks while you are there.
Salvaging the rubble is easy earned money. You can use that later to upgrade your ship.
